data.message: Carry on reading! Or you will die, even if you only looked at the word warning! Once there was a little girl called Clarissa, she was ten-year old and she lived in a mental hospital, because she killed her mom and dad. She got so bad she went to kill all the staff in the hospital so the More-government decided that the best idea aaa to get rid of her so they set up a special room to kill her, as humane as possible but it went wrong the machine the were using went wrong. And she sat there in agony for hours until she sued. Now every week on the day of her death she returns to the person that reads this letter, on a Monday night at 12:00a.m. She creeps into your room and kills you slowly, by cutting you and watching you bleed to death. Now send thus to ten other pictures on this one site, and she will haunt someone else who doesn't. This isn't fake. apparently, if u copy and paste this to ten comments in the next ten minutes u will have the best day of ur life tomorrow. u will either get kissed or asked out, if u break thus chain u will see a little dead girl in your room tonight. in 53 mins someone will say I love you

replies.message: Best one so far, not sharing rofl. nice spelling errors by the way, it was some good entertainment. Had a smile the entire time. I laugh at you for posting this.
